channel.title: Ffmpeg on Hugo Theme Tailwind Example Site
channel.description: Recent content in Ffmpeg on Hugo Theme Tailwind Example Site

item.title: Youtube DL
item.description:
Download

for webm(without audio)
SSYouTube: Online Video Downloader - SSYouTube.com

for audio
Yt5s Video Youtube Downloader For Free

Install

  1. 安装ffmpeg
brew install ffmpeg
  1. 安装 ffmpeg 的python api
    注意是 pip install ffmpeg-python
    instead of pip install ffmpeg
pip install ffmpeg-python

如果已经安装了 module 为 ffmpeg 的api，则先uninstall
注意此处区分 brew install 和 pip install 的区别


pip uninstall ffmpeg
pip uninstall ffmpeg-python

pip install ffmpeg-python

AttributeError: module ‘ffmpeg’ has no attribute ‘input’ · Issue #174 · kkroening/ffmpeg-python (github.com)
